links: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..143
mathematica: NextPrime[ n_Integer] := (k = n + 1; While[ !PrimeQ[k], k++ ]; k); Table[ NextPrime[5^n], {n, 0, 22} ] (* Mathematica 5 and below *)NextPrime[5^Range[0,25]] (* Mathematica 6; from _Harvey P. Dale_, Jun 19 2011 *)
